pages.text: $(info) $(thing)Redstone Tools$() are activated by taking damage or being near $(thing)Redstone Ore$().$(p)$(info) $(thing)Redstone Tools$() will slowly regain durability when near $(thing)Redstone Ore$().$(p)$(info) Active $(thing)Redstone Tools$() resist damage and are more likely to remain active by taking damage.

$(info) The $(item)Redstone Shovel$() has increased efficiency when active.
$(info) The $(item)Redstone Hoe$() tills dirt in a 3x3 area when active.
